groups.name: Blocks - Accordion
groups.description: Styles for the "Accordion" block.

fields.name: accordionHeadingIconSpace
fields.label: Space between heading text and the icon

groups.name: Blocks - Banners
groups.description: Styles for the "Banner Bar", "Large Banner", and "Large Banner Slider"  blocks.

fields.name: bannerBackgroundOverlay
fields.label: Overlay color
fields.description: The background color of an overlay that sits on top of the banner image or video and below the text.

fields.name: bannerBackground
fields.label: Background color
fields.description: Background color will only be seen if no image is uploaded.

fields.name: bannerContentButtonGap
fields.label: Space between buttons
fields.description: If there are multiple buttons beside each other in the banner, this will be the horizontal space between them.,

fields.name: bannerPadding
fields.label: Padding
fields.description: This is used when there is a lot of content to make sure that the content does't touch the edges of the banner.

groups.name: Banner content when no image or video
groups.description: Styles for when there is no image or video and only text

fields.name: bannerNoMediaColor
fields.label: Text color when no image or video

fields.name: bannerNoMediaTextShadow
fields.label: Text shadow when no image or video

fields.name: bannerPaddingTopNoImage
fields.label: Padding when no image or video

fields.name: bannerPaddingTopNoImageSm
fields.label: Padding (small screens) when no image or video

groups.name: Slider text pagination
groups.description: These style apply when text pagination is used for the slider

groups.name: Large banner images
groups.description: These are for the large banner that is often used on the home page or other top-level pages. It is typically taller than the banner bar images.

fields.name: bannerImageSizes
fields.label: Image sizes
fields.description: The different image sizes for the large banner background image. This is used to deliver the best image size to different device sizes

fields.name: bannerImageRatio
fields.label: Aspect ratio when cropping
fields.description: If the banner image needs to be cropped, this is the aspect ratio that will be used.

fields.name: bannerMinImageRatio
fields.label: Minimum aspect ratio
fields.description: If "How to crop the banner image" is set to "Do not crop the banner image unless it is too tall", this is the aspect ratio that will be used to determine if the image is too tall.

fields.name: bannerImageCropStrategy
fields.label: How to crop the banner image
fields.description: The banner image is considered too tall if its image ratio is less than the "Minimum aspect ratio" field value. (The lower the ratio the taller the image.)

options.crop: Always use the above image aspect ratios to crop the image
options.conditional: Do not crop the banner image unless it is too tall

fields.name: bannerImageCropOrientation
fields.label: Image crop orientation
fields.description: The default crop orientation for banner images when the image is too tall.

groups.name: Large banner overlay image
groups.description: Settings for the overlay image that is displayed on top of the banner image on the Large Banner.

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageGrid
fields.label: Content and image grid
fields.description: The content and image grid column sizes when an overlay image is used.

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageGridWidth
fields.label: Max width for the content and image grid

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageContentWidth
fields.label: Max width for the content
fields.description: This will override the "Max width for the content" field value

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageObjectPosition
fields.label: Image fit position
fields.description: The position of the image within the container

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageSmDisplay
fields.label: Display the overlay image on small screens

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageSmGap
fields.label: Gap between the image and content on small screens
fields.description: This only applies if the image is displayed on small screens.

fields.name: bannerOverlayImageSizes
fields.label: Overlay image sizes
fields.description: The different image sizes for the overlay image. This is used to deliver the best image size to different device sizes.

groups.name: Banner bar images
groups.description: These are for the banner bar that is often used on most pages. It is typically shorter than the large banner images.

fields.name: bannerBarImageSizes
fields.label: Image sizes
fields.description: The different image sizes for the banner bar background image. This is used to deliver the best image size to different device sizes

fields.name: bannerBarImageRatio
fields.label: Aspect ratio when cropping
fields.description: If the banner image needs to be cropped, this is the aspect ratio that will be used.

fields.name: bannerBarMinImageRatio
fields.label: Minimum aspect ratio
fields.description: If "How to crop the banner image" is set to "Do not crop the banner image unless it is too tall", this is the aspect ratio that will be used to determine if the image is too tall.

fields.name: bannerBarImageCropStrategy
fields.label: How to crop the banner image
fields.description: The banner image is considered too tall if its image ratio is less than the "Minimum aspect ratio" field value. (The lower the ratio the taller the image.)

options.crop: Always use the above image aspect ratios to crop the image
options.conditional: Do not crop the banner image unless it is too tall

fields.name: bannerBarImageCropOrientation
fields.label: Image crop orientation
fields.description: The default crop orientation for banner images when the image is too tall.

groups.name: Blocks - Icon Grid
groups.description: Styles for the "Image Grid" block.

groups.name: General styles
groups.description: styles for general content

groups.name: Typography
groups.description: Styles for the text in the icon grid

groups.name: Hover styles
groups.description: Styles for when the icon is hovered over (for links)

groups.name: Blocks - Image
groups.description: Styles for the "Image" block.

groups.name: Image Sizes
groups.description: The image can be set to "Full width", "Large", "Medium" or "Small" sizes. Below are the widths for those sizes. Only the width is set to allow the image to be any height. If additional widths are set then they will be used to resize the image smaller at those widths.

groups.name: Blocks - Image Grid
groups.description: Styles for the "Image Grid" block.

groups.name: Title text above image styles
groups.description: Styles for when the title is displayed above the image

groups.name: Title text below image styles
groups.description: Styles for when the title is displayed below the image

groups.name: Title text centered on image styles
groups.description: Styles for when the title is displayed centered on top of the image

groups.name: Title text bottom of image styles
groups.description: Styles for when the title is displayed on the bottom of the image

fields.name: blockImageGridTextBottomHoverStyle
fields.label: Height of the text overlay on hover
fields.description: This sets the initial height of the overlay bar.

fields.name: blockImageGridTextBottomInitialHeight
fields.label: Initial overlay height
fields.description: This sets the initial height of the overlay bar if it should grow to full height on hover. This is necessary so that the height is animated.

groups.name: Hover sub text styles
groups.description: This is for the sub text that shows when the image is hovered. This is only used when the text is positioned on the image.

groups.name: Content below the image
groups.description: This is for the content that can show below the image.

groups.name: Blocks - Image Gallery / Slider
groups.description: Styles for the "Image Gallery" block. This includes styles when it's displayed as a Grid or as a Slider.

groups.name: Grid - General
groups.description: General styles for the image gallery when it's displayed as a Grid.

groups.name: Slider - General
groups.description: General styles for the image gallery when it's displayed as a Slider.

groups.name: Slider - Content
groups.description: Styles for the content that shows on the slider.

groups.name: Slider - Arrows
groups.description: Styles for the arrows on the slider.

groups.name: Blocks - Wrapper
groups.description: Styles for the "Wrapper" block.

fields.name: blockWrapperBackgroundDark
fields.label: Dark background color
fields.description: The text color will automatically be set to white.

fields.name: blockWrapperBackgroundDarkColor
fields.label: Dark background text color
fields.description: The text color for when the dark background is used.

groups.name: Blocks - Wrapper With Background Image
groups.description: Styles for the "Wrapper with background image" block.

fields.name: blockWrapperWBgImageDisplay
fields.label: How to display the background image
fields.description:
If "Below the color backgrond" is selected, then the background colors should have transparency so that the image can be seen.
If "Above the color background" is selected, then the image should have transparency so that the background color can be seen.

fields.name: blockWrapperWBgImageBackgroundDarkColor
fields.label: Dark background text color
fields.description: The text color for when the dark background is used.

fields.name: blockWrapperWBgImageWidths
fields.label: Image widths
fields.description: The different widths to crop and create images for.

groups.name: Body
groups.description: Base styles for the website body. See the Typography section for core font styles.

fields.name: bodyBackground
fields.label: Body background color
fields.description: The background outside the main content.

fields.name: contentBackground
fields.label: Content background
fields.description: The background of the main content.

groups.name: Buttons
groups.description: Styles for buttons throughout the website.

groups.name: Container Widths
groups.description: Styles for page width containers.

fields.name: containerWidth
fields.label: Default page container width
fields.description: The maximum page content width.

fields.name: containerWidthNarrow
fields.label: Narrow page container width
fields.description: Used for the narrow width option on the "Content" block.

fields.name: containerWidthSmall
fields.label: Small page container width
fields.description: Mainly used on the search form.

groups.name: Footer
groups.description: Styles for the footer of the website.

groups.name: Forms
groups.description: Styles for all forms on the website.

fields.name: formRequiredShowAsterisk
fields.label: Show the "*" next to the field label for required fields

fields.name: formRequiredShowMessage
fields.label: Show the "Required fields" message below the form

fields.name: formRequiredMessageText
fields.label: Required fields text
fields.description: The text to show at the bottom of the form to explain what the asterix beside fields means.

options.belowExceptRadioCheckbox: Below the field unless the field type is radio or checkbox

fields.name: formButtonFullWidthSmallScreens
fields.label: Have the button be full width on small screens

groups.name: Form Overlay
groups.description: Styles for the overlay which pops up on a form submission.

groups.name: Header
groups.description: Styles for the header of the website.

groups.name: Main Navigation
groups.description: Styles for the main website navigation.

groups.name: Main Navigation - Dropdowns
groups.description: Styles for the main navigation dropdowns.

fields.name: navDropdownArrowOffset
fields.label: Right offset for the arrow if a dropdown as sub navigation

groups.name: Main Navigation - Menu Button
groups.description: Styles for the hamburger menu button seen on small screens.

groups.name: Messages
groups.description: Used to show a message upon successful form submission on certain pages like the account edit page.

groups.name: Notifications
groups.description: Styles for the "Notifications" Collection Widget below the banner on pages.

groups.name: Pagination
groups.description: Styles for the pagination at the bottom of app pages.

fields.name: paginationPadding
fields.label: Padding
fields.description: Padding around all of the pagination

fields.name: paginationMargin
fields.label: Margin
fields.description: Margin around all of the pagination

fields.name: paginationGapSize
fields.label: Gap between page numbers and the previous/next links

groups.name: Page Numbers Wrapper
groups.description: The wrapper around the page numbers

fields.name: paginationNumberWrapperPadding
fields.label: Padding
fields.description: Padding all around the page numbers

groups.name: Popups
groups.description: Styles for the optional popup that shows on page load and the notifications under the banner.

sections.name: Title
sections.description: The title is shown for notifications.

groups.name: Typography
groups.description: Styles for typography throughout the website.

groups.name: Lists
groups.description: Styles for ordered and unordered lists.

fields.name: baseListItemMargin
fields.label: List item margin
fields.description: This is for each list item.

fields.name: baseListItemPadding
fields.label: List item padding
fields.description: This is for each list item.

fields.name: columnListGap
fields.label: Column list gap
fields.description: When converting an ordered or unordered list to display in columns, this is the gap between the columns.

fields.name: columnListBulletStyle
fields.label: Column list bullet style
fields.description: When converting an ordered or unordered list to display in columns, this is the style of the bullets.

fields.name: columnListPadding
fields.label: Column list padding
fields.description: When converting an ordered or unordered list to display in columns, this is the padding for the ordered or unordered list.
